data.name: Dandelions in the Sky OST + Artbook
data.detailed_description:
The Artbook is a PDF file containing character introductions, game CGs, game extras, and the full version of the lyrics to the game's vocal track "To Encounter".
The OST contains the vocal track "To Encounter" and all the BGM that appears in the game, and will be available for download as MP3 and FLAC files.
data.about_the_game:
The Artbook is a PDF file containing character introductions, game CGs, game extras, and the full version of the lyrics to the game's vocal track "To Encounter".

data.short_description: This product contains the OST and Artbook collection of "Dandelions in the Sky".

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 150 MB available space
